 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * This file is part of the "dibi" - smart database abstraction layer.
 5:  *
 6:  * Copyright (c) 2005 David Grudl (http://davidgrudl.com)
 7:  *
 8:  * For the full copyright and license information, please view
 9:  * the file license.txt that was distributed with this source code.
10:  */
11: 
12: 
13: /**
14:  * dibi file logger.
15:  *
16:  * @author     David Grudl
17:  * @package    dibi
18:  */
19: class DibiFileLogger extends DibiObject
20: {
21:     /** @var string  Name of the file where SQL errors should be logged */
22:     public $file;
23: 
24:     /** @var int */
25:     public $filter;
26: 
27: 
28:     public function __construct($file, $filter = NULL)
29:     {
30:         $this->file = $file;
31:         $this->filter = $filter ? (int) $filter : DibiEvent::QUERY;
32:     }
33: 
34: 
35:     /**
36:      * After event notification.
37:      * @return void
38:      */
39:     public function logEvent(DibiEvent $event)
40:     {
41:         if (($event->type & $this->filter) === 0) {
42:             return;
43:         }
44: 
45:         $handle = fopen($this->file, 'a');
46:         if (!$handle) {
47:             return; // or throw exception?
48:         }
49:         flock($handle, LOCK_EX);
50: 
51:         if ($event->result instanceof Exception) {
52:             $message = $event->result->getMessage();
53:             if ($code = $event->result->getCode()) {
54:                 $message = "[$code] $message";
55:             }
56:             fwrite($handle,
57:                 "ERROR: $message"
58:                 . "\n-- SQL: " . $event->sql
59:                 . "\n-- driver: " . $event->connection->getConfig('driver') . '/' . $event->connection->getConfig('name')
60:                 . ";\n-- " . date('Y-m-d H:i:s')
61:                 . "\n\n"
62:             );
63:         } else {
64:             fwrite($handle,
65:                 "OK: " . $event->sql
66:                 . ($event->count ? ";\n-- rows: " . $event->count : '')
67:                 . "\n-- takes: " . sprintf('%0.3f', $event->time * 1000) . ' ms'
68:                 . "\n-- source: " . implode(':', $event->source)
69:                 . "\n-- driver: " . $event->connection->getConfig('driver') . '/' . $event->connection->getConfig('name')
70:                 . "\n-- " . date('Y-m-d H:i:s')
71:                 . "\n\n"
72:             );
73:         }
74:         fclose($handle);
75:     }
76: 
77: }
78:
